name: GOT Name Generator
description: Winter is coming... and so is your awesome Game of Thrones inspired name! Find out what you'd be called in Westeros!
introduction: Ever wondered what your name would be if you were a noble, a warrior, or even a dragon in the world of Game of Thrones?  This generator mixes lore and a touch of madness to forge a name worthy of the Iron Throne (or at least a comfy seat in Winterfell). Prepare to be amazed (or mildly amused)!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold your destiny!
Feeling picky? Click again! We've got enough combinations to keep you entertained through a long winter.
Share your epic new GOT name with your friends and see who reigns supreme!
Pro Tip: Pair your generated name with a suitable house sigil for maximum effect.  (Dragons only, please!)

faqs.question: Is this generator officially affiliated with HBO or George R.R. Martin?
faqs.answer: Absolutely not! This is purely a fan-made creation, crafted with love (and a healthy dose of imagination). We're just big fans who enjoy playing with names.

faqs.question: Will this generator tell me my future in Westeros?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. We're good with names, not prophecies. But if you get a cool name, maybe that's a sign of great things to come... or maybe just a cool name.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Game of Thrones fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Of course! Consider it our gift to the realm of fan fiction. Just promise us you'll write a good story!

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name I get?
faqs.answer: No worries! Just hit 'Generate' again. We have countless combinations, so you're bound to find one you love (or at least tolerate).

faqs.question: Are the names generated based on actual GOT characters?
faqs.answer: We've drawn inspiration from GOT lore, but the combinations are mostly random. You might see hints of familiar names, but most will be unique creations.

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! Enjoy this generator without any cost.
